Reference

Reading ion count data

Checking files, and loading ion count data and associated meta-data.

ICdir_chk()

Check if directory is suitable for point

read_IC() read_meta()

Read raw ion count data

unfold() fold()

Access and hide IC metadata

Correcting ion count data

Functions to correct pulsed ion coun data for systematic machine-induced biases.

cor_IC()

Process raw ion count data

cor_yield() cor_DT()

Correct ion detection bias

QSA_test()

QSA test

predict_ionize()

Predicting trends in ionization efficiency

zeroCt()

Remove analytical runs with zero counts

Analysing ion count data

Functions to calculate internal and external precision of pulsed ion count data of single ions and ion ratios.

stat_X() stat_R()

Analyse raw ion count data

stat_SDprop()

Propagation of errors for isotope ratios

Diagnostics of ion count data

Functions to check for internal consistency of ion count ratio data; enabling detection of isotopic variability in the analyte.

diag_R()

Diagnostics isotope count data

Cameca() CooksD() CV() Rm() norm_E() QQ() IR()

Family of diagnostics functions for isotope count ratios

Miscellaneous tools to handle ion count data

Functions for easy plotting and printing of ion count data.

cov_R()

Function for co-variate conversion of isotope systems

ion_labeller() R_labeller() stat_labeller()

Chemical species names for plots and tables
